Reviews.Content: Execellent location! Had a good stay with my family at the BaliRani's.Execellent location to shopping malls. 10 minutes walk to kuta beach. Lots of shops near hotel. Friendly staff. Only dislike is the breakfast. they should have a better spread. Not much of variety.too basic!otherwise, it's all good. nice pool.rooms were ok. the floors were a bit dirty  dusty.but we didn't spend much time in the room except for sleeping, so didn't bother us much!
Reviews.Author: lini-81

Reviews.Content: the rani hotel and spa, tuban       the rani hotel and spa
Reviews.Author: holly2297

Reviews.Content: Simple and cozy       bali rani hotel - room 103
Reviews.Author: nonodarling

Reviews.Content: Love Rani This hotel is quite new, so everything still OK! Didn't try the spa but we walked to Febris ( next door ) for Spa and Massage, excellent and value for money! Short walk to Discovery Shopping Mall
Reviews.Author: MahinaXXL

Reviews.Content: good budget hotel I booked this hotel because i couldn't get extension at the Dynasty (fully-booked) after a business trip, and because my friend stayed there. I got very skeptical cos i got a bargain (50 usd a night) through my cousin's travel agent (she told me for foreigners the rate is even cheaper.. weird) i was put into a twin-bed room, but cudn't complain cos i didn't specify bedding prefernce in booking, in the second floor overseeing the pond, and the room was immaculately clean. The mattress is great, i had better sleep here than in the more expensive Dynasty. I couldn't sleep at ALL at dynasty cos i could feel the spring of the mattress, but at Bali Rani, it wasn't a problem. I slept like a baby for 8 hours, thanks to the hotel's sensible thought of using thick comforter.. Aircon can be a problem. My friend's room was still not cold after 2 hours of turning the aircon on, while mine, even as it worked, the aircon emitted strange noise in the first 10 mins. tv: full channel listing, including axn, movies, natgeo and discovery, spanish, italian, korean, japan, arabic, chinese channels as well as news such as cnn, bbc, fox and cnbc. Breakfast was very tasty, better than most hotels in the 50-100 usd a night category i have ever stayed in Bali. Drinks here, including alcoholic, are very affordable. sure, there are many restaurant offering cheaper rate, but i don't mine spending 4 usd for a glass of pina colada :)).location wise, it's the opposite of discovery mall and next to waterboom. great for families. the downside: no beach (10 mins walking to beach), and traffic in front of the hotel, and otw from/to hotel can be very busy. bottomline: if i don't need a beach, i will definitely stay here. Otherwise, i'd prefer staying at Kumala Pantai or Pelangi Bali in Seminyak for the beachfront location.
Reviews.Author: safircraze

Reviews.Content: back to Bali This was our first trip back to Bali in years we had stayed at The Kuta Beach Club for the last 3 yrs we had gone but I did check out other hotels on our last visit in 2002 and The Bali Rani was one of them. Friends of our had been back to Kuta Beach Club since the bombing and had said the breakfast had gone downhill since our last visit so we decided to give The Bali Rani ago. It is a little bit further to go to the Matahari but this helps you walk off your breakfast. You have the discovery mall across the road and waterbom park just a couple of doors down. We found the staff very friendly, I loved the pool but I must agree about the people putting their towels on the lounges then going out I think the management needs to address this situation it is a bit unfair if they are not going to be there then maybe after an 1hr their towel should be removed by the pool person. But apart from that I loved the place this why we are going back for 2mths this year.
Reviews.Author: cheekyaust

Reviews.Content: Everything is GREAT! Everything is great in this hotel, except their breakfast..but no worries..if you dont like it..take a few minutes walk and you'll find Discovery Shopping Mall..they got everything under the sun..from fast food..to local delights..everything is just great..the hotel is clean..thought a bit small, hotel staff is friendly..and honest..there is this time..i left my wallet in the room..(mind you, with all my cash, credit cards, id, license...) i called up the hotel and ask tell them bout my situation...(because i asked for a room cleaning before i left out)..in worry the cleaning person might took it...they actually didn't infact..when i came back to the hotel..(after 12 hours)..they actually kept my wallet..and nothing is lost..not even a single cents...
Reviews.Author: ywey

Reviews.Content: Value for money Location: Good if you do not require beach-front. Mid-way between Kuta Beach/downtown Kuta and Tuban Beach. Walking distance to downtown Kuta and Kuta Beach (to view surfers and sunset!). Plenty of restaurants/cafes/bars nearby and shopping mall is opposite. The Waterbom water theme park is next to ittoo. Traffic along the road where hotel is located can be very bad at night as road is narrow and there are way too many cars/taxis plying the road. These coupled with the endless hordes of tourists waking along the road and the numerous horse carriage joy-rides make it somewhat difficult to walk and/or cross the road especially for the older folks or people with young kids/babies.Overview of hotel: Entrance of hotel is quite nice with its traditional open courtyard look. As the public areas like the lobby and corridors are open the hotel only has air-conditioning in the rooms.The hotel has a nice courtyard with running water around a big gazebo-like area where one can relax and read. The rooms either overlook this courtyard or the swimming pool.Swimming pool: So-so, not too big, probably meant more for sun-bathing :) Pool-side bar opens till late at night.Coffee house: Most people use this place only at breakfast. For lunch and dinner hardly see any one! Suppose they, like us, prefer the wide variety of cafes and restaurants outside, all within walking distance. Cheaper too! Breakfast spread not too lavish but was reasonable, with international as well as local food available. Room: Reasonable size. Reasonably clean but somewhat run-down (as with most of the hotel). Cable TV, coffee making facilities, fridge and complimentary water (2 bottles) provided. Facilities: Hotel is quiet most of the time, except for the pool. There was no music/entertainment at the bar as the main lounge/bar was under renovation. The Thai restaurant (Thai Express) did not seem to be too popular. No safe in room but safe-deposit boxes available for free at main desk. Money changing booths easily available on the streets, reasonable rates.Tour information: The hotel does not seem to have any real info for tourists or tour info. Hardly any real tour brochures. Maybe they expect tourists to go the the tour info booths littered all over the main road for tour info and to book tours.Staff: Courteous, friendly and helpful.Summary of Hotel Bali Rani: Good value for money. Good location in the sense that it is not too crowded but within walking distance to downtown Kuta and all the eating places. Hotel is quiet and not too big or too small. There is a spa located within the hotel (did not try it).
Reviews.Author: nshkl

Reviews.Content: Not the best, but nice We moved to Bali Rani from Barong, and it was a good decision. ConvenientLy Located in near shops and restaurants, it's not as noisy as Barong area at night. We booked a triple room, it was still pretty spacious even with shopping bags scattered everywhere. The beds and pillows were comfortable. We didn't use the pool because we were out all day. The staff were friendly and nice. Breakfast was nice, but after 4 days in a row I got bored of it.
Reviews.Author: amadl

Reviews.Content: Great location Bali Rani hotel is a great hotel in Bali, very clean, staff are lovely and it is located across the road to the discovery shopping centre and the beach. This hotel is located in Tuban and it is 5 min walk to Kuta (main shopping area), we were told by our travel agent not to stay in the heart of Kuta as at night the streets can be very noisy, and yes the streets, nightclubs, restaurants are very noisy all hours of the night, so we were happy to walk to kuta and go back to our nice quiet hotel!the breakfast buffet is very nice, lovely food! the hotel has two restaurants, a cafe, pool, spa room, bar,snack bar and money sxchange.They have a lady who can paint your nails near the pool while you are sunbaking, she does a lovely job, painting flowers on your toes, very cheap, only $2.00 AUS, she is very nice.Overall... a very nice, well located, clean hotel, definatly go back again.
Reviews.Author: nuffa

Reviews.Content: relax by pool--on what ???? Very dissapointed. went to relax with a friend for her birthday and could not get a chair to sit on by the pool. Pool man obviously wanted to be paid to reserve a chair for you. Had to go up to bar to order any food as the pool staff were so slack . Staff were sleezy and made me uncomfortable. Trust me , they were not being the lovely bali friendly type of people. This is my 10 th time in Bali and I would only recommend this hotel to older travellers. On the plus side , it is close to shopping and resturants so there is not too much walking that needs to be done ! If you want to go there , make sure you have a pool side room, an d go with a partner ! I would recommend Kartika , which is across the road , although check before booking as there is some beach repairing going on and I have heard it is a bit noisy at the moment.
Reviews.Author: truthtellerAustralia

Reviews.Content: September 2007 at the Bali Rani Stayed 2 weeks at the Bali Rani 8th Sept - 22nd Sept.We choose this hotel because we stayed there in november 2005.We requested ground floor rooms overlooking the pool, we got them. The room was clean and a good size for the 3 of us (2 adults  1 10yr boy).The hotel grounds are keep very clean  tidy - no fault there.The breakfast was the same as in 2005, eggs any way you like, bacom, ham, noodles, rice, pancakes, french toast, cerial  fruits.The staff at the hotel are very freindly and always willing to help.The only fault was thet the room was cleaned/serviced at different times during the day and I don't think they use any cleaning products the do the bathroom or when they mop the floor.I would stay here again because I like the location.
Reviews.Author: salty66

Reviews.Content: Nice hotel       the pool
Reviews.Author: ScubaTuna

Reviews.Content: Average hotel, average location. Give it a miss. I鈥檝e recently (September) spent two weeks in this hotel. Location: The Bali Rani is well in Tuban (South Kuta) and the large Discovery shopping mall is basically just on the other side of a very very busy Kartika Plaza road. Is a bit of a walk to the beach (that is if you do not get skittled crossing the road!!)Rooms: The room was very clean and the ground level poolside rooms are a must!! I had no issues with the room. There was a good selection of channels on the tv (if so inclined) and housekeeping did a fantastic job.Pool: The pool area is pretty good. There鈥檚 a pool bar (NOTE: IS NOT A SWIM UP BAR!!!). Pool is not quite as big as it looks in the brouchures and on the net. The area is kept really clean. The only downside is that I would hate to be there during a peak period. If you were not up early to reserve a lounge by the pool, you would miss out. There was no policing of the unattended towels on the chairs. I noted one day that a couple reserved their chair at 8am and then went out for the day and didnt return until after 4pm and every other single lounge was taken. Staff: the staff was generally helpful and courteous. Guest mix: The majority of the guests during my stay were Europeans (mainly germans) with a lot of Indos and Japs thrown in.Food: What can I say...BLAH BLAH BLAH. Food was ok but not inspiring. the thought of Oprah in a thong bikini was more appealing that the buffet breakfast (give it a miss entirely!!!). The food at the pool bar was pretty good for a snack. Go out for your meals!Security: What is that?? The security guys were there purely for show.Conclusion: You get what you pay for. Is an OK hotel but in bali have stayed in better. Can I recommend this hotel to other travellers? Nope. Why, I would not stay at this hotel again so I cannot recommend it to anyone else..
Reviews.Author: bundyone

Reviews.Content: Tropical Paradise with only very minor faults       pool area hotel Bali Rani
Reviews.Author: Voyager

Reviews.Content: Loved it, can't wait to return! This was my first solo trip to Bali and I couldn't have been better placed at the Bali Rani. From the second I arrived I was greeted and treated like a member of royalty. The staff are lovely, nothing is too much of a bother and the hotel is gorgeous. The rooms are quite simple but clean and sufficient. The hotel lobby is gorgeous as is the pool and bar area. As far as meals go the breakfasts are wonderful and included in the price, all you can eat buffet. I ate at the hotel restaurant one night which was amazing, there was a huge buffet presented for a set price, with drinks and traditional Balinese dancing and entertainment afterwards, a great atmosphere. The clientele was mixed, couples, singles, business people and families and this worked very well. The highlight of my stay at Bali Rani was my 5 hour spa treatment in the hotel's day spa, for a very small price I got pampered and preened with the quality and expertise that you could pay ten times as much for elsewhere. I can't wait to return to Bali and I will definitely be staying again at Bali Rani.
Reviews.Author: walana

Reviews.Content: cant beat this for value I have just arrived home after my 12th trip to bali.I stayed at the kuta paradiso this time feb 06. I wished i had stayed at the bali rani.I have stayed here 5 times the last being nov 04. I like this hotel for its lovley staff and great value for money . Staying in another hotel has made me appreciate this one more. I love the way they close off the pool at 9am(U can swim after but no noise is allowed) This hotel is quiet at night .the rooms are very nice for a 3 star hotel better than the 5 star i have just stayed in. excellent value for money.
Reviews.Author: aaabbbccc
